data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,075 believers in Ranong and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ranong, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Ranong, Thailand will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Ranong to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,075 believers in the state of Ranong.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Han Chinese, Cantonese people. Make the Han Chinese, Cantonese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Ranong, Thailand, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 166,300 people living in the state of Ranong.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Ranong do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
